name: Revna's Tale
description:
Hello!  We are students from Uppsala University looking to see if there would be interest in a game like this - a mystery solving game with a Viking twist!  Since this game is not finalized yet, do read the notes below: 

1. To talk to people in the game, walk close to them and click on them 

2. When it's time to proceed to the next level, there's a sign below the town center where Harald is to the far left if you follow the path 

3. This is not a finished/ polished product, it's still a prototype (you might notice this due to lack of animations/ bugs/ lack of music). So thank you for your time and feedback!
